welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Osaka, a vibrant city known for its delicious street food, stunning architecture, and warm hospitality. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Osaka has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, serving mainly low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network by registering their email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Kansai International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain period of time.
